name: AllinaHealthERWaitTimes
0:
”Alexa, ask Allina for wait times in Minneapolis”
”Alexa, ask Allina how long wait times are near 54022”
”Alexa, ask Allina for wait times in Richfield, Minnesota”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: allina
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Best for Minnesota and select Wisconsin residents, Allina Health ER Wait Times gives real-time estimates for how long you may have to wait to be seen by a provider after arriving at an emergency room. It also considers your location to recommend the most convenient care options for you. With Allina Health ER Wait Times, make quick decisions in emergency situations with confidence.

Allina Health ER Wait Times connects you to major Minnesota emergency rooms through the Allina Health care network, and even includes a Wisconsin location in Rivers Falls. Add the skill to your Alexa-enabled device by simply saying “Alexa, enable Allina Health ER Wait Times”
